long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Dranzleyder translates the text on your webpage to a softer pronunciation system for the English language.

As an example, "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia" becomes the dranzleyduhd "Ihd'z Ohlweyz Zuhnee ihn Vihluhdehlveeuh". Softer pronunciation to keep those vocal cords ready for when you really need 'em!

The Dranzleyder supports 133,289 of your favorite verbs, articles, adjectives, adverbs, and nouns (proper, too!). It even supports contractions!
